plot: After learning his father has escaped the psychiatric hospital, Kevin orders an APB to track him down. Jill attempts to break an endurance record. Holed up in Indiana, a disillusioned Tom makes an unsettling discovery.

Kevin's father escapes the mental hospital and tries to get Kevin to accept an invitation; Tom starts to realize that Wayne has been deceiving him; Nora and Kevin take their relationship to the next level; Kevin awakens to find a stray dog in his backyard; Jill tries to break a dangerous record.—chingeeflingee
